__e: I mean, it's beyond anything we ever imagined, Charlie.
When you can see past all the things that you know and believe in somethin' better.
Why show me this if I'm past all hope?
Not this time, Doctor, we're beyond that now.
I've seen a lot in my life. Today was... Beyond.
But sometimes... Sometimes. We have to consider things beyond our feelings.
And sometimes what the heart dictates makes no sense at all.
They are beyond fear... Because, they are forever young.
